name: Lying Lights
description:
It's a story about lying lights. Or not really lights... Or not really lying... You are a captain of an old airship, which name is RUST (the first letter is missing). Choose whom and what to trust.

You should definitely check it out if you like steampunk and story-based games.

It was made by me (I did all the programming, storyline and music), my brother (the one who made the art for the airships and the lighthouse) and my friend (amazing art for the captain which I wasn't able to use to the full, unfortunately). We had unexpected problems right before the end of the submissions period, so bugs are included, sorry for that...

Would love to know your opinion, if this idea is worth developing.

dreamsbfast.com

Also play our other game:

Draw a way for Kolobok (on Google Play)
